mapper.sql: SELECT s.stack_id, s.workplace_id, w.company_id, c.company_name, w.workplace_name, s.stack_name, s.prevention, s.reg_date, s.note, sf.name AS sub_factory_name, md.name AS department_name FROM stack `s` INNER JOIN workplace `w` ON w.workplace_id = s.workplace_id INNER JOIN company `c` ON c.company_id = w.company_id LEFT JOIN sub_factory `sf` ON sf.sub_factory_id = s.sub_factory_id LEFT JOIN management_department `md` ON md.management_department_id = s.management_department_id
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM stack WHERE workplace_id = #{workplace_id} AND stack_name = #{stack_name}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stack (workplace_id, stack_name, prevention, reg_date, note, sub_factory_id, management_department_id) VALUES (#{workplace_id}, #{stack_name}, #{prevention}, #{reg_date}, #{note}, #{sub_factory_id}, #{management_department_id})
